title: 'Project Fatherhood' Teaches Parenting Skills To Inner-City Dads
teaser: Mike Cummings and Jorja Leap are working with men in Los Angeles — many of whom are former gang members — to help them find something that was missing from their lives as they grew up: fatherhood.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
